Typealiases.html#/s:16CerebellumWidget25.name: GetClaimedRewardsCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:16CerebellumWidget25.abstract: Type for GetClaimedRewardsCallback parameter that is used for onGetClaimedRewards event handler.

Typealiases.html#/s:16CerebellumWidget22.name: GetUserByEmailCallback
Typealiases.html#/s:16CerebellumWidget22.abstract: Type for GetUserByEmailCallback parameter that is used for onGetUserByEmail event handler.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:16Cerebellum.name: bundleJSPath
Structs/Environment.html#/s:16Cerebellum.abstract: Constant value for path to main bundle script file.

Structs/Environment.html.name: Environment
Structs/Environment.html.abstract: Struct to set the widget running environment. It contains settings to work in specified environments.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: sendDataToField(fieldName:value:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The method to set values for widget fields (like email, confirm. code, etc.)

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: setUserData(data:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The method to set additional data related to current widget user.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: expand()
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: This method should expand the widget on full screen.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: restore()
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: This method should restore the widget to initial size after calling expand().

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: resize(width:height:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: This method should set custom size for the widget.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: logout()
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: This method should log out the widget’s user.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onInitializationFinished(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onInitializationFinished event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onHide(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onHide event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onSignUp(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onSignUp event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onSignIn(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onSignIn event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onProcessNonFungibleReward(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onProcessNonFungibleReward event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onGetClaimedRewards(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onGetClaimedRewards event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.name: onGetUserByEmail(_:)
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html#.abstract: The metod to set handler for onGetUserByEmail event.

Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html.name: CerebellumWidgetProtocol
Protocols/CerebellumWidgetProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that contains all API methods of CerebellumWidget.

Enums/WidgetMode.html#/s:16CerebellumWid.name: LOGIN
Enums/WidgetMode.html#/s:16CerebellumWid.abstract: This mode is used to provide login functionality for the application.

Enums/WidgetMode.html#/s:16CerebellumWid.name: REWARDS
Enums/WidgetMode.html#/s:16CerebellumWid.abstract: Default mode. It is used to show rewards and sharing capability of the widget.

Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html#/s:16Cere.name: redemptionInstructions
Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html#/s:16Cere.abstract: String instructions on how to redeem the reward.

Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html#/s:16Cere.name: additionalInfo
Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html#/s:16Cere.abstract: Array of additional information (ref. code, serial number, etc.) that is related to this reward.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: defaultFrame
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Stores initial size of the widget. Default value is whole screen size, but frame with width * frameGapFactor and height * frameGapFactor.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: frameGapFactor
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Factor that specifies width of the frame between the widget and screen bounds.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: initAndLoad(parentController:applicationId:userId:sections:env:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Initializes and prepares the widget for usage.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: show()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Shows the widget if it is hidden.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: hide()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Hides the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: sendDataToField(fieldName:value:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Autofills specified field with value to reduce amount of questions to user (i.e. email).

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: setMode(mode:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets the mode to present the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: setUserData(data:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets additional information to be shown in widget in JSON format. Only level and name are supported now.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: collapse()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Minimizes the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: expand()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Expanding the widget view on full screen.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: restore()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Restores size of the widget after expanding.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: resize(width:height:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets custom size for the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: logout()
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Logs out of the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onInitializationFinished(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler that is called when widget is finished initialization.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onHide(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler that is called on widget closed.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onSignUp(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler to be called when user finished sign up flow.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onSignIn(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler to be called when user successfully signed in to the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onProcessNonFungibleReward(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler to be called when user wants to buy non fungible reward like gift card. Additional actions should be performed in the hosting app.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onGetClaimedRewards(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler to be called when user opens Inventory tab. List of redeemed rewards should be passed to the widget.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.name: onGetUserByEmail(_:)
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html#/s:16Cereb.abstract: Sets handler to be called when user provides email in the widget to ask hosting app if the user is registered in the app.

Classes/CerebellumWidget.html.name: CerebellumWidget
Classes/CerebellumWidget.html.abstract: Class that implements CerebellumWidgetProtocol and provides all the functionality of the widget.

Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html.name: ClaimedRewardItem
Classes/ClaimedRewardItem.html.abstract: Class to define reward item. Instances of this class are used for OnGetClaimedRewards event handler.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
